'''Angry ghast''' is an angry version of the [[ghast]] only found in [[Java Edition 25w14craftmine]]. They shoot three [[fireball]]s instead of one at a time.

== Spawning ==
One angry ghast spawns in the Angry Ghast special mine, which unlocks after the player defeats a ghast by deflecting its fireball at it.

== Drops ==
Angry ghasts drop {{xp|4}} [[experience]] orbs when killed by a [[player]] or a tamed wolf.

== Behavior ==
The angry ghast is often more dangerous than the normal ghast. Similar to a [[blaze]], it shoots 3 fireballs at the same time, but they can instantly kill a player if very close to the explosion. They can also cause high amounts of block damage when shooting fireballs. Fireballs have an <code>ExplosionPower</code> of 3.
